translation: 1 day, 11 days, 21 days (the Great White One who's always in the east), 2 days, 12 days, 22 days (always in the southeast), 3 days, 13 days, 23 days (always in the south), 4 days, 14 days, 24 days (always in the southwest), 5 days, 15 days, 25 days (always in the west), 6 days, 16 days (always in the northwest), 7 days, 17 days, 27 days (always in the north), 8 days, 18 days, 28 days (always in the northeast), 9 days, 19 days, 29 days (always in the center and entering the earth), 10 days, 20 days, 30 days (always in the heavens), and the Right White One who's rotating in January as above, and every month as well, always follows the years of epidemics in heaven, and after death there's much wastage.
It's always necessary to go along with it and not allow it to go against it.
It's permissible for people to leave and enter, migrate far away, and travel.
It's also used for marriages, paying respects to officials, and fights.
They should always act in accordance with the above sun and time.
Use them in a way that's according to the above sun and time.
It's very fortunate.

source_sentence: 如逆行不順此太白所在行法者皆凶。
translation: If you go against the flow and don't follow the flow of Tai Bai, it's bad.

source_sentence: 戰不勝所有移徙遠行等亦無利益。
translation: When war doesn't prevail, all migrations and long-distance travels are also not beneficial.
It's always necessary to follow it, and everything that's done is auspicious.

source_sentence: 文殊師利菩薩及諸仙所說吉凶時日善惡宿曜經卷下
translation: Second Fascicle of the Sutra on Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva and the Sage's Teaching on Auspicious and Inauspicious Times and Good and Evil Constellations and Luminaries
